title: Japan vs Scotland, Rugby World Cup 2019: What time is kick-off today, what TV channel is it on and what is our prediction?
text:
What is it?

Japan vs Scotland - a Pool A qualification showdown to decide who goes through to the World Cup quarter-finals.

There was a big question mark hanging over this fixture in the form of a Category 5 Super Typhoon named Hagibis but a stadium inspection has taken place and the match will go ahead.

When is the match?

Today, so Sunday, October 13.

What time is kick-off?

11.45am BST at the Nissan Stadium in Yokohama.

What TV channel is it on?

This one is on ITV. You can also follow this game right here with Telegraph Sport.
